required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on March 04, 2022
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: The HUNT for Heart Failure" Risk Score
clinical_study.official_title: Heart Failure Burden and Heart Failure Risk in the General Population in Norway: "The HUNT for Heart Failure" Risk Score

collaborator.agency: Norwegian University of Science and Technology

brief_summary.textblock:
In this population study aim is to evaluate risk factors for heart failure and combine these into a new heart failure risk score.
Secondly, the heart failure risk score will be internally and externally validated, and compared with established heart failure risk scores. Additionally, the prevalence of heart failure as well as the distribution of the heart failure risk score in the general population will be evaluated.

detailed_description.textblock:
Explore which clinical risk factors or patient characteristics in a general population that are associated with increased risk for heart failure events and combine these into a new population-based heart failure risk score ("The HUNT for heart failure risk score") for predicting heart failure risk
Validate the newly developed heart failure risk score internally in the HUNT2 database
Compare the predictive ability of the new heart failure risk score with established heart failure risk scores (the ABC Health HF risk score, the Framingham HF risk score) and an established Norwegian cardiovascular risk score (NORRISK 2)
Estimate the prevalence of likely ("undiagnosed") heart failure , i.e., patients at high risk of HF, in a general population by using both the established heart failure risk scores and the newly developed heart failure risk score, and compare the heart failure event rate between those at high risk of heart failure and those with established heart failure.

primary_outcome.measure: Time to incident heart failure event
primary_outcome.description: Time to first heart failure hospitalization or heart failure related visit at the out-patient clinic (events defined according to the ESC 2016 heart failure guidelines)

secondary_outcome.measure: Time to death from any cause
secondary_outcome.description: Time to death from any cause

secondary_outcome.measure: Time to first heart failure event or death from any cause
secondary_outcome.description: Time to first heart failure event (hospitalization or HF related visit at the out-patient clinic) or death from any cause

secondary_outcome.measure: Validity of heart failure risk score
secondary_outcome.description: Evaluation of the validity of heart failure risk score

other_outcome.description: Prevalence of heart failure in a general population

other_outcome.measure: Distribution of heart failure risk score categories
other_outcome.description: Distribution of the heart failure risk score categories in a general population

arm_group.arm_group_label: Participants in the third wave of the HUNT study
arm_group.description: General population participating in the third wave of the HUNT study

arm_group.arm_group_label: Participants in the second wave of the HUNT study

intervention.description: Evaluation by heart failure risk score
intervention.arm_group_label: Participants in the second wave of the HUNT study
Participants in the third wave of the HUNT study

biospec_descr.textblock: Biobank available, but not included in this project. Laboratory test made available are haematology overview, renal function serology, C-reactive protein

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Participation in the third or second wave of the HUNT study
Exclusion Criteria:
- Not willing to participate
- Missing vital data
